name: Judicial action of foreclosure before public sale
text: This part shall not prohibit the borrower, the foreclosing mortgagee, or any other creditor having a recorded lien on the mortgaged property before the recordation of the notice of default under section 667-23, from filing an action for the judicial foreclosure of the mortgaged property in the circuit court of the circuit where the mortgaged property is located. [L 1998, c 122, pt of §1; am L 2011, c 48, §31]
